column4: okay got the multiverse up.. search for the needed pack in synaptic and got nothing back.. Any ideas?
<-trying to get Java support for Firefox :)
Have done that.. and everything good so far.. But a search for the needed pack comes up empty
so is that pack no longer avail?
searching now in Synaptic for sun-j2re1.5
read the sources section and you will not read much more
no not lame- just read that guide link and follow the instructions to update your sources
that will allow apt-get and synaptic to find a good java package for u
you just need to add two lines to one texxt file
its the one I just posted - or add this to the bottom of /etc/apt/sources.list
that's the site i gave you the link to originally
did you add one line or two to sources.list?
